The 'Rani' Diamond and Ruby Pendant Haar

₹33,922

Description

A fusion of traditional craftsmanship and contemporary design. The carved ruby adds a touch of heritage while the diamond settings highlight its natural beauty. This 'Haar' is a heirloom-quality piece that will be cherished for generations. The unique pendant shape ensures you stand out from the crowd. The superior diamond quality guarantees exceptional brilliance.

Materials

  • 18k Yellow Gold. Features a striking
  • carved Ruby center stone
  • surrounded by brilliant-cut Diamonds. Diamonds are estimated to be VS clarity and G color. Finished with a Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.

Features

This contemporary 'Haar' (necklace) reimagines traditional South Indian jewelry. The geometric diamond links create a modern, sophisticated chain. The focal point is a large, exquisitely carved Ruby pendant, in a unique hexagonal shape. The surrounding diamond halo enhances the Ruby's rich color and adds brilliance. The setting showcases a delicate pave setting for maximum sparkle.
